comment: This contains basic configurations for the zotero-wikibase tool.

prop_formatterurl.name: formatter URL
prop_formatterurl.comment: A property needed for building URL out of ExternalId values, datatype String, Wikidata P1630.

prop_wikidata_entity.name: Wikidata Entity
prop_wikidata_entity.comment: externalId-prop for "Wikidata entity"; this points to the exact-match Wikidata entity (maps a Wikibase entity to a Wikidata entity), and has formatter URL and formatter URI "http://www.wikidata.org/entity/".

prop_wikidata_reference.name: Referenced Wikidata Entity
prop_wikidata_reference.comment: externalId-prop for "referenced Wikidata entity"; this points to a referenced Wikidata entity (=an entity reconciliation annotation, used as qualifier in literal statements), and has formatter URL and formatter URI "http://www.wikidata.org/entity/".

prop_formatterurirdf.name: formatter URI for RDF resource
prop_formatterurirdf.comment: A property needed for building URI out of ExternalId values, datatype String, Wikidata P1921.

prop_zotero_item.name: Zotero item
prop_zotero_item.comment: ExternalId-prop for linking bibliographical items to your Zotero group collection. formatter URL will be 'https://www.zotero.org/groups/[group_num]/[group_name]/items/$1/item-details'.

prop_zotero_PDF.name: Zotero fulltext PDF
prop_zotero_PDF.comment: externalId-prop for linking items to its full text PDF stored as Zotero attachment. formatter URL will be 'https://www.zotero.org/groups/[group_num]/[group_name]/items/$1/item-details'.

prop_instanceof.name: instance of
prop_instanceof.comment: A property of datatype WikibaseItem, Wikidata P31.

prop_subclassof.name: subclass of
prop_subclassof.comment: A property of datatype WikibaseItem, Wikidata P279.

prop_itemtype.name: bibliographical item type
prop_itemtype.comment: A property of datatype WikibaseItem, bibliographical item type (used for pointing to the Zotero item type, e.g. 'journal article').

prop_inverseprop.name: inverse property
prop_inverseprop.comment: A property needed for linking inverse properties to each other, Wikidata P1696.

prop_series_ordinal.name: series ordinal
prop_series_ordinal.comment: Datatype String, Wikidata P1545, used e.g. in crator statements for representing the order in ordered lists.

prop_source_literal.name: source literal
prop_source_literal.comment: A datatype String property, used as qualifier, e.g. in creator statements.

prop_given_name_source_literal.name: given name source literal
prop_given_name_source_literal.comment: A datatype String property, used as qualifier in creator statements.

prop_family_name_source_literal.name: family name source literal
prop_family_name_source_literal.comment: A datatype String property, used as qualifier in creator statements.

prop_isbn_10.name: ISBN-10
prop_isbn_10.comment: Datatype ExternalId, Wikidata P957. Used for 10-digit-ISBN identifiers. Most conveniently with formatter URL "https://worldcat.org/isbn/$1".

prop_isbn_13.name: ISBN-13
prop_isbn_13.comment: Datatype ExternalId, Wikidata P212. Used for 10-digit-ISBN identifiers. Most conveniently with formatter URL "https://worldcat.org/isbn/$1".

prop_language.name: publication language
prop_language.comment: Datatype item, for linking publications to their language of publication (dct:language)

prop_published_in.name: published in
prop_published_in.comment: Datatype item, for linking publications to their container (a journal, for journal articles, a book, for books

prop_wikidata_sitelinks.name: Wikipedia page URL
prop_wikidata_sitelinks.comment: Datatype URL, for Wikipedia sitelinks from Wikidata

prop_equivalentprop.comment: Datatype URL, points to a URI describing an equivalent property. Use 'Wikidata Entity' for Wikidata matches.
prop_equivalentprop.name: external equivalent property

prop_equivalentclass.comment: Datatype URL, points to a URI describing an equivalent class. Use 'Wikidata Entity' for Wikidata matches.
prop_equivalentclass.name: external equivalent class

class_ontology_class.comment: The class that groups all ontology classes.
class_ontology_class.name: Ontology Class

class_bibitem.comment: The class that groups bibliographical records.
class_bibitem.name: BibItem

class_bibitem_type.comment: The class that groups bibliographical item types (journal article, book, etc.)
class_bibitem_type.name: BibItem Type

class_creator_role.comment: The class that groups creator role properties (e.g. author, translator).
class_creator_role.name: Creator Role

class_journal.comment: The class that groups periodical publications.
class_journal.name: Journal

class_language.comment: The class that groups natural languages.
class_language.name: Language

class_organization.comment: The class that groups organizations (can be creators, publishers,...).
class_organization.name: Organization

class_person.comment: The class that groups natural persons.
class_person.name: Human
